" };
View as a web page
Place the WorkFit-TL on an open surface, stand up and you're ready to work!
The industry leading provider in Ergonomics and the ability to sit or stand easily is Ergotron. One of our best-selling solutions is the WorkFt-T - Item number 347951 or WorkFit-TL - Item number 887538. No assembly required! Just place it on your existing desk and it easily and safely adjusts from sitting to standing.
Find the right fit for your retrofit project. View our WorkFit-T brochure.
Meet the WorkFit Product Family Â»
